function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of low-cost open-source hardware and software may result in lower quality and reliability of monitoring systems.","Impact":"Increased risk of system failure leading to inaccurate data and inability to detect contagious disease outbreaks.","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough testing and quality assurance processes on the monitoring systems to ensure reliability and accuracy.","Technologies":"Quality assurance testing, reliability testing, continuous monitoring and maintenance.","People":"Developers, manufacturers, and users of monitoring systems.","Owner":"Developers, manufacturers, and users of monitoring systems."},{"Description":"Dependence on Bluetooth, ZigBee, and WiFi for communication in Wireless Sensor Networks (WSN) may limit coverage and data transmission capabilities.","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness of monitoring systems in large networks or areas, leading to gaps in data collection and potential disease outbreak detection.","Mitigation":"Consider using a combination of multiple technologies, such as ZigBee, WiFi, and MQTT, to improve network coverage and data transmission capabilities.","Technologies":"Multi-technology integration, network optimization, gateway deployment.","People":"System architects, network engineers, and technology integrators.","Owner":"System architects, network engineers, and technology integrators."},{"Description":"Energy consumption and cost of each monitoring node may impact the scalability and deployment of wireless monitoring systems.","Impact":"Limited scalability of monitoring systems and potential gaps in coverage, reducing the effectiveness of disease propagation mitigation.","Mitigation":"Optimize energy consumption and cost of monitoring nodes through hardware and software improvements, and consider the use of low-power communication technologies like Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE).","Technologies":"Energy-efficient hardware design, low-power communication technologies, cost-effective sensor development.","People":"Hardware and software developers, system integrators, and technology vendors.","Owner":"Hardware and software developers, system integrators, and technology vendors."}]}
